1594540.name: Xanguito Aventura Demo
1594540.description:
Xanguito Aventura is a 2D platform game that aims to pay homage to the platform games of the 90s.

It is a game inspired by classic platforms such as Mario Bros, Sonic or Megaman.

It also has a mechanic of lives by hearts reminiscent of the classic Zelda.

The game mechanics are simple. Jump, double jump, and some power ups that will allow the character to shoot, fly or invincibility.

Un this demo you can play the first 5 levels of the game.
1594540.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
